模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.Networking.rmi

类 RMIClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.Networking.rmi.RMIClient
所有已实现的接口:
Client, Listener, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIClient extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Listener, Client
The RMIClient class is responsible for connecting to a remote RMI server and handling communication.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RMIClient

      public RMIClient(String ip, int port, Ui ui) throws RemoteException
      Constructs an RMIClient that connects to a remote RMI server.
      参数:
      ip - the IP address of the remote server
      port - the port number on which the remote server is listening
      ui - the user interface object to handle messages and interactions
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if there is a problem with the remote method invocation

    • heartBeat

      public void heartBeat() throws RemoteException
      Handles the heartbeat signal from the client. This method is called to indicate that the client is still active and connected. It is typically invoked periodically by the client to ensure it remains connected.
      指定者:
      heartBeat 在接口中 Listener
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if a communication-related exception occurs during the remote method call.
